mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDR1, ADDR2, POST, USEYN, CODE, JOIN_DATE, DEL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE CODE = '2' LIMIT 17

SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDR1, ADDR2, POST, USEYN, JOIN_DATE, DEL_DATE, CODE, CASE WHEN CODE='1' AND USEYN='Y' THEN '관리자' WHEN CODE='2' AND USEYN='Y' THEN '일반회원' WHEN CODE='2' AND USEYN='N' THEN '탈퇴회원' WHEN CODE='3' AND USEYN='N' THEN '정지회원' END AS 'MEMBER_CODE' FROM MEMBER ORDER BY JOIN_DATE DESC
SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDR1, ADDR2, POST, USEYN, JOIN_DATE, DEL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PW = #{mem_pw}, MEM_NAME = #{mem_name}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{PHONE}, ADDR1 = #{addr1}, ADDR2 = #{addr2}, POST = #{post} WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
UPDATE MEMBER SET USEYN = 'N', DEL_DATE = NOW() WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, PROD_IMAGE, PRICE, QUANTITY, SIZE, DELIVERYFEE, POST, ADDR1, ADDR2, ORDER_DATE, DEL_DATE, CASE WHEN ORDER_STATE = 'orderCompleted' THEN '주문 완료' WHEN ORDER_STATE = 'orderCancel' THEN '주문 취소' END AS ORDER_STATE, CASE WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'depositCompleted' THEN '입금 완료' WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'completePayment' THEN '결제 완료' WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'refundExpected' THEN '환불 예정' WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'paymentCancel' THEN '결제 취소' ELSE PAYMENT_STATE END AS PAYMENT_STATE, CASE WHEN PAYMENT_METHOD = 'bankTransfer' THEN '무통장 입금' WHEN PAYMENT_METHOD = 'creditCard' THEN '카드' END AS PAYMENT_METHOD FROM TRANSACTION ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC LIMIT 14;

SELECT ORDER_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, PROD_IMAGE, PRICE, QUANTITY, SIZE, DELIVERYFEE, POST, ADDR1, ADDR2, ORDER_DATE, DEL_DATE, CASE WHEN ORDER_STATE = 'orderCompleted' THEN '주문 완료' WHEN ORDER_STATE = 'orderCancel' THEN '주문 취소' END AS ORDER_STATE, CASE WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'depositCompleted' THEN '입금 완료' WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'completePayment' THEN '결제 완료' WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'refundExpected' THEN '환불 예정' WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'paymentCancel' THEN '결제 취소' ELSE PAYMENT_STATE END AS PAYMENT_STATE, CASE WHEN PAYMENT_METHOD = 'bankTransfer' THEN '무통장 입금' WHEN PAYMENT_METHOD = 'creditCard' THEN '카드' END AS PAYMENT_METHOD FROM TRANSACTION ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT ORDER_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, PROD_IMAGE, PRICE, QUANTITY, SIZE, DELIVERYFEE, POST, ADDR1, ADDR2, ORDER_DATE, DEL_DATE, CASE WHEN ORDER_STATE = 'orderCompleted' THEN '주문 완료' WHEN ORDER_STATE = 'orderCancel' THEN '주문 취소' END AS ORDER_STATE, CASE WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'depositCompleted' THEN '입금 완료' WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'completePayment' THEN '결제 완료' WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'refundExpected' THEN '환불 예정' WHEN PAYMENT_STATE = 'paymentCancel' THEN '결제 취소' ELSE PAYMENT_STATE END AS PAYMENT_STATE, CASE WHEN PAYMENT_METHOD = 'bankTransfer' THEN '무통장 입금' WHEN PAYMENT_METHOD = 'creditCard' THEN '카드' END AS PAYMENT_METHOD FROM TRANSACTION WHERE ORDER_NO = #{order_no}
SELECT T.MEM_ID, SUM(T.PRICE * T.QUANTITY) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM TRANSACTION T LEFT JOIN PAYMENT P ON T.ORDER_NO = P.ORDER_NO GROUP BY T.MEM_ID;
SELECT NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, AUTHOR, REGDATE, VIEW_CNT, USEYN FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NUM DESC

SELECT R.RNO, R.REVIEW_TITLE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NAME, R.PROD_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_IMAGE, R.REVIEW_REGDATE, R.REPLY, R.REPLY_ID, R.REPLY_NAME, R.REPLY_REGDATE AS REPLY_DATE, R.USEYN FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCT P ON R.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID ORDER BY R.REVIEW_REGDATE DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REPLY = #{reply}, REPLY_ID = #{reply_id}, REPLY_NAME = #{reply_name}, REPLY_UPDATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE RNO = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT MONTH, COALESCE(TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS MONTH, SUM(o.price * o.quantity) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM `transaction` o JOIN product p ON o.PROD_NO = p.PROD_NO WHERE o.ORDER_STATE = 'orderCompleted' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(o.ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m') UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL seq.seq - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS MONTH, NULL AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM (SELECT 1 AS seq UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 UNION ALL SELECT 10 UNION ALL SELECT 11) AS seq WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL seq.seq - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') NOT IN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m') FROM `transaction` o WHERE o.ORDER_STATE = 'orderCompleted' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(o.ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m') ) ) AS subquery ORDER BY MONTH

SELECT MONTH, COALESCE(TOTAL_SALES, 0) AS TOTAL_SALES FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS MONTH, SUM(quantity) AS TOTAL_SALES FROM `transaction` WHERE ORDER_STATE = 'orderCompleted' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m') UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL seq.seq - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS MONTH, NULL AS TOTAL_SALES FROM (SELECT 1 AS seq UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 UNION ALL SELECT 10 UNION ALL SELECT 11) AS seq WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL seq.seq - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') NOT IN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m') FROM `transaction` WHERE ORDER_STATE = 'orderCompleted' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m') ) ) AS subquery ORDER BY MONTH
SELECT YEAR(ORDER_DATE) AS year, SUM(PRICE * QUANTITY) AS totalSales FROM `TRANSACTION` WHERE ORDER_STATE = 'ORDERCOMPLETED' GROUP BY YEAR(ORDER_DATE)
